series.name: Veronica Mars
series.comment: The best combination of high school drama, crime and sassy one-liners.
series.plot: After her best friend is murdered, and her father is removed as county Sheriff, Veronica Mars dedicates her life to cracking the toughest mysteries in the affluent town of Neptune.

series.name: Dark
series.comment: This is my top favourite show, all categories. It's smart, everything in it has meaning, it's dark and beautiful. But keep your coffee and notebook handy, because it will get complicated.
series.plot: A family saga with a supernatural twist, set in a German town where the disappearance of two young children exposes the relationships among four families.

series.name: The office US
series.comment: My go-to feelgood show to put on when I want to have a laugh
series.plot: A mockumentary on a group of typical office workers, where the workday consists of ego clashes, inappropriate behavior, and tedium.

series.name: Yellowjackets
series.comment: You will not be able to sleep alone at night, but it will totally be worth it. Thrilling story, intriguing mystery and fantastic performances by the actors.
series.plot: A wildly talented high school girl soccer team becomes the (un)lucky survivors of a plane crash deep in the Canadian wilderness.

series.name: Community
series.plot: A suspended lawyer is forced to enroll in a community college with an eccentric staff and student body.

series.name: Thunder in my heart
series.plot: A group of young friends as they come of age and strive to meet the unexpected demands of adult life while coming to terms with their own identities, pasts, and passions.

series.name: Kalifat
series.plot: Agent Fatima gets a tip that a terrorist act is planned in Sweden. At the same time, teenager Sulle has opened her eyes to her student assistant who opens the doors to a fascinating new world.

series.name: Mr Robot
series.comment: What first seems like a thrilling show about a hacker, turns out to be something completely unique and mind-boggling.
series.plot: Elliot, a brilliant but highly unstable young cyber-security engineer and vigilante hacker, becomes a key figure in a complex game of global dominance when he and his shadowy allies try to take down the corrupt corporation he works for.

series.name: Chernobyl
series.plot: In April 1986, an explosion at the Chernobyl nuclear power plant in the Union of Soviet Socialist Republics becomes one of the world's worst man-made catastrophes.

series.name: Breaking bad
series.plot: A chemistry teacher diagnosed with inoperable lung cancer turns to manufacturing and selling methamphetamine with a former student in order to secure his family's future.

series.name: Fyre
series.plot: An exclusive behind the scenes look at the infamous unraveling of the Fyre music festival.

series.name: The Tinder Swindler
series.plot: Posing as a wealthy, jet-setting diamond mogul, he wooed women online, then conned them out of millions of dollars. Now some victims plan for payback.

series.name: Black mirror
series.comment: Personal favourite episodes include Shut Up and Dance, White Bear and Nosedive
series.plot: An anthology series exploring a twisted, high-tech multiverse where humanity's greatest innovations and darkest instincts collide.

series.name: The plot against America
series.comment: A mini-series exploring what America would have looked like in an alternate world, if nazi supporters would get an increasing grip of the country, shown through the eyes of an ordinary jewish family. The subtle shift in atmosphere we get to experience episode by episode is masterful and makes me terrified.
series.plot: Characters live in an alternative history in which Franklin D. Roosevelt was defeated in the U.S. presidential election of 1940 by Charles Lindbergh.

series.name: True Detective
series.plot: Seasonal anthology series in which police investigations unearth the personal and professional secrets of those involved, both within and outside the law.

series.name: American Vandal
series.comment: A bit immature, but also hysterically funny satire of the true-crime genre.
series.plot: A true-crime satire that explores the aftermath of a costly high school prank that left twenty-seven faculty cars vandalized with phallic images.

series.name: Years and Years
series.comment: Hidden gem of a mini-series that made me both laugh and cry. Beautiful take on the future, technology, politics, all seen through the eyes of an ordinary family.
series.plot: As Britain slowly turns into a dictatorship throughout the years, the lives of a typical busy family from Manchester converge on one crucial night in 2019.

series.name: Altered carbon
series.comment: Violent (warning!), but really intriguing and philosophical if you get past that.
series.plot: Set in a future where consciousness is digitized and stored, a prisoner returns to life in a new body and must solve a mind-bending murder to win his freedom.

series.name: Never Have I Ever
series.plot: The complicated life of a first-generation Indian-American teenage girl, inspired by Mindy Kaling's own childhood.

series.name: His dark materials
series.comment: A beautiful and powerful (both visually and thematically) coming-of-age story set in a fantasy world.
series.plot: A young girl is destined to liberate her world from the grip of the Magisterium which represses people's ties to magic and their animal spirits known as daemons.

series.name: Stranger Things
series.comment: Suspenseful, nostalgic, well-produced and a little bit scary. What else could you want from a tv-show?
series.plot: When a young boy disappears, his mother, a police chief and his friends must confront terrifying supernatural forces in order to get him back.

series.name: Last of us
series.plot: After a global pandemic destroys civilization, a hardened survivor takes charge of a 14-year-old girl who may be humanity's last hope.

series.name: 8 days
series.comment: A hidden gem if you are into apocalypses like me. A german mini-series that explores what would happen if you knew that you and your loved ones only had a few days left to live.
series.plot: A family attempts to escape from the impact zone of an asteroid that is due to hit Earth in eight days.

series.name: 12 monkeys
series.comment: Based on the movie from 1995, this is an entertaining adaption filled with mysteries, time travel and twists.
series.plot: Follows the journey of a time traveler from the post-apocalyptic future who appears in present day on a mission to locate and eradicate the source of a deadly plague that will nearly destroy the human race.

series.name: Sweet tooth
series.plot: A boy who is half human and half deer survives in a post-apocalyptic world with other hybrids.

series.name: Station Eleven
series.comment: A slow but beautiful show about the end of the world and the humans left in it
series.plot: A post apocalyptic saga spanning multiple timelines, telling the stories of survivors of a devastating flu as they attempt to rebuild and reimagine the world anew while holding on to the best of what's been lost.

series.name: White Lotus
series.plot: The exploits of various guests and employees of a tropical resort over the span of a week.
